name: iDots and boxes - Adventure
description:
iDots And Boxes is a game version with adventure mode.
In Adventure mode you will enjoy unlock items and playing different maps.
There are three modes :
● Adventure with 135 levels
● Solo with grids size 5x5 to 12x12
● Multiplayer with grids size 5x5 to 12x12

Three difficulty for Adventure and Solo level (Easy, Medium and Hard )

Current name of this game are :
● Squares
● Pigs in a Pen
● Boxes
● Square­it
● Paddocks
● Dots and Dashes
● Line Game
● Smart Dots
● Dot Boxing
● Dot Game.

Try to win in Hard mode !
